title: Survival of the Friendliest with Brian Hare, PhD
itunes:title: Survival of the Friendliest with Brian Hare, PhD
description: Compared with other animals, dogs are brilliant in one important way: They can understand and communicate with us, their human companions. Brian Hare, PhD, of Duke University, talks about what we know about canine cognition and how studying dogs’ evolutionary journey from wild wolves to domesticated pets can teach us more about humanity’s history as well.
